messages.subject: Unschooling Nutrition
messages.msgSnippet: For families new to unschooling food and for moms who want to learn more about nutrition for your own health, please join our new group, Unschooling
messages.messageBody:
For families new to unschooling food and for moms who want to learn more about nutrition for your own health, please join our new group, "Unschooling Nutrition". Here is the home page description. The focus is on ADDing nutrients and sharing naturally delicious recipes!
http://health.groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolingNutrition/


Eating Joyfully & Listening To Our Body

*Naturally delicious recipes shared.

*Food and Behavior

*Additives and Nutrients

*Immune Strengthening Foods

*Healing With Whole Foods

*Infection Prevention & Superfoods

*Allergies & Eczema

*Probiotics

*Candida & Thrush

*How to Make Traditional Foods


This group is for unschooling families. The focus is on listening to our body and finding what feels joyful to eat, recognizing how additives and nutrients affect your body and discovering delicious nutrition consensually!



Join the discussion about how to unschool food joyfully!
http://health.groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolingNutrition/


Pat Robinson
